caption: A female vocalist sings this happy Indian wedding song. The tempo is medium fast with a cheerful dholak and a rhythmic shaker made of ghungaroos. The song is a minimalist, cheerful, happy, festive, celebratory and joyful song sung during Punjabi wedding rituals.
